message: The "Civi\Test\CiviTestListenerPHPUnit7" class implements "PHPUnit\Framework\TestListener" that is deprecated.

The "Drupal\Component\EventDispatcher\Event" class extends "Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event" that is deprecated since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead.
